abstract: Online spending is up 4 percent this season, a small but positive bump, and people are pushing their shopping later than ever.
snippet: Online spending is up 4 percent this season, a small but positive bump, and people are pushing their shopping later than ever.
lead_paragraph: Sales at online retailers have not been as dreary as the weather in much of the country during the run-up to Christmas, but they have not necessarily been a harbinger of a happy new year, either.

headline.main: Late-Coming Shipping Promotions Drive Online Shopping
